select s.*,CONCAT_WS(' ',s.`NAME`,s.CODE,s.PIC_CODE,b.`NAME`,s.`NAME`,v.`NAME`,s.SPECIAL_PARAM,s.`DESCRIPTION`,'销售价:', 0,'库存:',CAST((select sum(o.INVENTORY_QUANTITY) from inv_onhand o where o.PRODUCT_ID = s.ID) as SIGNED)) as val, (select sum(o.INVENTORY_QUANTITY) from inv_onhand o where o.PRODUCT_ID = s.ID) as stock, 0 as salePrice,s.BAR_CODE as barCode,s.SPECIAL_PARAM as specialParam,s.id,s.NAME as name, b.name as brand,v.name as vehicle,m.name as madein,'12' as AAA_BBB
from mtl_product s LEFT JOIN mtl_product_brand b on s.BRAND_ID = b.ID left JOIN mtl_product_madein m on m.ID = s.MADEIN_ID LEFT JOIN mtl_product_vehicle v on v.ID = s.VEHICLE_ID
where 1=1
and (s.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') or s.code like concat('%',#{name},'%') or s.PIC_CODE like concat('%',#{name},'%') or b.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') or m.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') or v.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') )

select p.id, ( select b.PRICE from sal_sales_order a,sal_sales_order_line b where a.id = b.ORDER_ID and a.DELETED_FLAG !='Y' and a.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId} and b.PRODUCT_ID = p.id order by b.ID desc limit 1 ) as lastPrice from mtl_product p where p.id in(${productIds})
